summary.para: This structure is used to pass information for an alternate platform to.
Setup implicitly uses the SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1 structure if USE_SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1 is set to 1 or if _WIN32_WINNT is less than or equal to 0x500. This version is for use with Windows 2000.
Setup implicitly uses the structure if USE_SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1 is 0 or undefined and _WIN32_WINNT is set to 0x501.

member.name: SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure, in bytes.

summary.para: Operating system. This must be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003, Windows XP, or Windows 2000.

member.name: SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1.MajorVersion
member.summary: Major version of the operating system.

member.name: SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1.MinorVersion
member.summary: Minor version of the operating system.

member.name: SP_ALTPLATFORM_INFO_V1.ProcessorArchitecture
member.summary: Processor architecture. This must be PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_INTEL, PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_ALPHA, PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_IA64, PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE_ALPHA64.
